name: SQLite
description: Powerful database interface for querying and managing SQLite databases directly.
full_description: This server provides a Model Context Protocol (MCP) interface for SQLite databases, allowing AI models to execute SQL queries, inspect schemas, and manage data structures. Security is maintained by restricting access to a specific database file.

tools.name: list_tables
tools.description: List all tables in the database.

tools.name: describe_table
tools.description: Get schema information for a specific table.
